Property Details Map/Street View
Email a Friend Request a Showing Print Flyer Share | Pin It Description
What a BEAUTY! ''Hamptons Style Home'' a stone's throw from the shores of LAKE LIVINGSTON! Subdiv boat ramp is just across the street. Home has a Detached oversized garage--PERFECT for a WORKSHOP and/or your boat! 4BR/2BA, large corner lot, outdoor storage building, partially privacy fenced for the 4-legged members of the family, this home will DELIGHT w/ laminate flooring in living area and tile in the Large Eat-In Kitchen with HUGE Breakfast Counter. Make 5 Lakeshore your 2nd Home or Primary!
